prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Organ, Guitar, Bass, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Drums, Organ, Guitar, and Bass, but no Piano.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Drums, Organ, Guitar, and Bass, but Piano is absent.

Style 3:
This composition is made up of Drums, Organ, Guitar, and Bass, Piano excluded.
